body.text:
Vaj 1; folio 26r1-v4 (Cz 27.1-1)
namo śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya / //
evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān / śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma / jetavane / anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ

children.text: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya / śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat / atha khalu bhagavān / śrāvastīṃ mahānagarī

piṇḍāya caritvā paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdad bhagavān / prajñapta evāsane paryaṃkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya / atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkkraman upasaṃkkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavaṃtaṃ tṛḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtvā

body.text:
Vaj 2; folio 26v4-27v6 (Cz 27.16-28.17; P 179.14-24)
tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ tasyām eva pariṣadi sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ

children.text: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat / āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisatvā mahāsatvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa / yāvad eva tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parittāḥ paramayā parindanayā / kathaṃ bhagava
bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam / kathaṃ pratipattavyam / kathaṃ cittaṃ pratigṛhītavyam / evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad av
t / sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte anuparigṛhītās tathāgatena bodhisat

meṇānugraheṇa / parittās tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ paramayānuparindanayā / tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye / yathā bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ / yathā pratipattavyam / yathā cittaṃ pratigṛhītavyam / evaṃ bhagavann i

body.text:
Vaj 3M folio 27v6-28v1 (Cz 28.17-29.7; P 179.24-180.10)
bhagavāṃs tān etad avocat / iha subhūte bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitair evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / yāvaṃtaḥ satvāḥ satvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā upapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naiva saṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ yāvat satvadhātuḥ prajñapyamānaḥ prajñapyate te mayā sarve anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parini

children.text: sacet subhūte bodhisatvasya satvasaṃjñā pravartate na sa bodhisatva iti vaktavyaḥ
na sa subhūte bodhisatvo vaktavyo yasya satvasaṃjñā pravarteta jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā pravarteta

body.text:
Vaj 4; folio 28v1-29r5 (Cz 29.8-30.5; P 180.10-15)
api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvena

children.text: stupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam / na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ
tavyam / na rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu na dharmapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvena dānaṃ dātavyam / yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ prati
yaḥ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ apratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti
te puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum / tat kiṃ manyase subh
syāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇam udgrahītum / subhūtir āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarā
ūrdhvaṃ vidikṣu-r-avidikṣu / daśasu dikṣu / sukaram ākāśasya pramāṇam udgrahītum / subhūtir āha / na hīdaṃ bhagavan /

subhūte / evam etat subhūte yo bodhisatvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum / api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ bodhisatvena dānamayaṃ puṇyakṛyāvastuṃ dānaṃ dātavyam /

body.text:
Vaj 5; folio 29r5-v4 (Cz 30.6-14)
tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathāgato lakṣaṇasaṃpadā draṣṭavyaḥ

children.text: bhagavān āha na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ
yā sā tathāgatena lakṣaṇasaṃpad bhāsitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat / evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat / y
te lakṣaṇaṃ tāvan mṛṣā / yāvad alakṣaṇaṃ tāvad amṛṣā

body.text:
Vaj 6; folio 29v4-31v6 (Cz 30.15-32.5)
evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūti

children.text: bhagavaṃtam etad avocat / asti bhagavan kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyā
rūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti / bhagavān āha / mā tvaṃ subhūte

ty anāgate 'dhvani ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti / api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani bodhisatvā mahāsatvā paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne śīlavaṃto guṇavaṃtaḥ prajñāva

to bhaviṣyaṃti / na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti / naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti / api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti anekabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti / ye imeṣv eva
tapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣv ekacittaprasādamātram api pratilapsyaṃte / jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena sarve te aprameyaṃ puṇyaskaṃdhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti pratigṛhīṣyaṃti
subhūte bodhisatvānām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate na satvasaṃ
na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartsyate / nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate nādharmasaṃjñā nāpi teṣāṃ saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartsyate / tat kasya hetoḥ
tsyate sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet / satvagrāho jī
o bhavet / satvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāha iti
sandhāya tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhiḥ dharmāḥ eva prahātavyāḥ prāg evādharmāḥ /

body.text:
Vaj 7; folio 31v6-32vl (Cz 32.6-33.2)
punar aparaṃ bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat / tat ki

children.text: manyase subhūte kācit tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā / kaścid vā dharmas tathāgatena deśitaḥ // subhūtir āha / yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi nāsti sa kaścid dha
s tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā / nāsti sa kaścid dharmo y

body.text:
Vaj 8; folio 32vl-34rl (Cz 33.3-26)
tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya imāṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasr

children.text: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt / subhūtir āha / bahu bhagavan bahu sugata / sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidān
t tathāgato bhāṣate puṇyaskandhaḥ askandha iti bhagavān āha / yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ tṛsāhasrāmahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dad
āt / yaś ceto dharmaparyāyad aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayed ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt / aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ
ato nirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ
buddhadharmāḥ buddhadhannā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāś caiva te /

body.text:
Vaj 9a; folio 34rl-5 (Cz 33.26-34.11)
tat kiṃ manyase subhūte / api nu srotāpannasya evaṃ bhavati mayā srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam iti / subhūtir āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan

children.text: na hi sa bhagavan kiṃcid āpanna
tenocyate srotāpanna iti / na rūpam āpanno na śabdā
na rasān na spraṣṭavyān na dharmān āpannaḥ

body.text:
Vaj 9b; folio 34vl-35rl (Cz 34.12-18)
bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāminaḥ evaṃ bhaven mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti / subhūtir āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan

children.text: na sakṛdāgāmino evaṃ bhavati mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti / tat kasmād dhetoḥ
na hi sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvam āpannaḥ

body.text:
Vaj 9c; folio 35rl-4 (Cz 34.19-25)
bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti

children.text: na sa kaścid dharmaḥ yo 'nāgāmīti / samanupaśyati / tenocyate anāgāmīti /

body.text:
Vaj 9d; folio 35r4-v2 (Cz 34.26-35.6)
bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte / api nv arhato evaṃ bhavati mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti / subhūtir āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan / tat ka

children.text: hi bhagavan sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhan nāmaḥ
ptam iti / sa eva tasyātmagrāho bhavet / satvagrāho j

body.text:
Vaj 9e; folio 35v2-36rl (Cz 35.6-14)
aham asmi bhagavan / // tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenāraṇavihāriṇām agryo nirdiṣṭaḥ

children.text: na ca me bhagavann evaṃ bhavati aham asmi arhann iti / sacen mama bhagavann evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti / na me tathāgato vyākariṣyati / araṇā
/ kulaputro na kvacid viharati / tenocyate / araṇāvihārīti araṇāvihārīti /

body.text:

bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte / kaścid dharmas tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatā

children.text: bhagavān āha / na sa kaścid dharmaḥ tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ

body.text:
Vaj 10b; folio 36r4-v2 (Cz 35.21-25; P 180.17)
bhagavān āha / ya

children.text: kaścit subhūte bodhisatvo evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti sa vitatha
kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhā hy ete tathāgatena bhāṣitā

body.text:
Vaj 10c; folio 36v2-37r3 (Cz 35.25-36.12; P 180.17-181.1)
tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ apratiṣṭhitaṃ

children.text: na rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ / na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / na kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / tad yathā
i nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavet / yasyaivaṃrūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tad yathāpi
manyase subhūte mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet / subhūtir āha / mahān bhagavaṅ mahā
tmabhāvo bhavet / bhagavan / tat kasya hetoḥ
tenocyate ātmabhāva iti / na hi sa bhāvaḥ

body.text:
Vaj 11; folio 37r3-38r2 (Cz 36.13-37.10; P 181.1-13)
bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāvaṃtyo gaṃgānadyāṃ vālukās tāvaṃtya eva gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ

children.text: api nu tāsu bahvyo vālukā bhaveyuḥ
subhūtir āha / tā eva tāvad bhagavan bahvyo gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ prāg eva yās tāsu vālukāḥ
bhagavān āha / ārocayāmi te subhūte prativedayāmi te yāvaṃtyas tāsu gaṃgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyuḥ
tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ kaścid eva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt / tat kiṃ manyase subhūte
api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt / subhūtir āha / bahu bhagavan bahu sugata / sā strī vā puruso vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt

bhagavān āha / yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt / yaś ceto dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet / ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ pra

api tu khalu subhūte yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā sa pṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūto bhavet / sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya kaḥ punar vādaḥ subhūte ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti / tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharaty anyatarānyataro vā gurusthānīyaḥ

Vaj 14a; folio 40rl-vl (Cz 39.9-21; G 5a5-5bl; P 183.3-10 )
atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ dharmapravegenāśrūṇi prāmuṃcat / pravartayaṃ so 'śrūṇi parimārjya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat / āścaryaṃ bhagavan / paramāścaryaṃ sugata / yāvad ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ

children.text: yato me bhagavan / jñānam utpannaṃ na mayā jātv eva dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ
parameṇa te bhagavan / āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe bhūtasa
yā caiṣā bhagavan / bhūtasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā tasmā

children.text: ryasamanvāgatās te satvā bhaviṣyaṃti / ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā nottrasiṣyaṃti / na saṃtrasiṣyaṃti /
ca tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate tām aparimāṇā buddhā bhagavaṃto bhāṣaṃte

children.text: yadā me subhūte kaliṃgarājā aṃgapratyaṃgāny a
chetsīn nāsīn me tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā satvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā na me kācit saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā babhūva
sacet subhūte mama tasmin samaye ātmasamjñābhaviṣyat / vyāpādasaṃjñāpi me 'bhaviṣyat tasmin samaye

abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani paṃca jātiśatāni yad ahaṃ kṣāṃtivādī riṣir abhū tadāpi me nātmasaṃjñā babhūva / na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā / tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvānuttarāyāṃ s

ksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam / na rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / na dharmapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / nādharmapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / na kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / tat kasmād dhetoḥ
tasmād eva tathāgato bhāṣate rūpāpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /

Vaj 14f; folio 42v3-43rl (Cz 42.5-12; P 185.4-8)
api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvenaivaṃ dānaparityāgaḥ parityajyaḥ sarvasatvānām arthāya

children.text: yaiva ca satvasaṃjñā sa evāsaṃjñā / ya eva te sarvasatvā
bhūtavādī subhūte tathāgataḥ satyavādī tathāvādī tathāgato na vitathāvādī tathāgato /

body.text:

children.text: isatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati / tad yathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣo
sūrye 'bhyudgate nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet / evaṃ bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastvapatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /

sarve te satvāḥ aprameyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti /

yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā pūrvāhṇakālasamaye gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet / madhyāhṇakālasamaye sāyāhṇakālasamaye gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvā

children.text: sahasrāṇy ātmabhāvān parityajet / yaś cemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā / na pratikṣiped ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt / aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam / kaḥ punar vādaḥ yo Iikhitvodgṛhṇ
yāt / dhārayet / vācayet / paryavāpnuyāt / parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet /
